text.div: This value set provides an example of possible coded concepts representing medicinal products based on their generic composition of active substance(s) with strength. This is what usually identifies PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 2. Please note that this Value set is not representing the IDMP PhPIDs. It is envisioned that future version will be based on the IDMP PhPIDs when available for actual use.
